splits.name: c64_memory_map_zero_page_stack
splits.description: C64 zero page ($0000-$00FF) complete map - processor port, BASIC pointers, FAC/ARG registers, keyboard/cursor state, I/O device status, RS232 buffers, stack page ($0100-$01FF)

splits.name: c64_memory_map_system_vic_sid
splits.description: C64 system area ($0200-$03FF) - input buffer, file tables, interrupt vectors, BASIC vectors. VIC-II registers ($D000-$D3FF) - sprites, screen control, colors. SID registers ($D400-$D7FF) - voices, filter, volume

splits.name: c64_memory_map_color_cia_rom
splits.description: C64 color RAM ($D800-$DBFF), CIA #1 ($DC00) keyboard/joystick/timers, CIA #2 ($DD00) VIC bank/serial bus/timers, expansion I/O, KERNAL ROM ($E000-$FFFF), hardware vectors, bank switching notes
